abstract: Participants in Arrowhead Ultra 135, ultradistance foot, bike or ski race held in Minnesota in January, must precisely choose type and amount of gear they pack, which depends  largely on weather conditions.
lead_paragraph: Cardiovascular fitness and mental discipline are important in the Arrowhead Ultra 135, an ultradistance race in Minnesota, but don’t discount mastery of one’s gear.

headline.main: To Carry the Day, Racers Must Fill Their Packs Carefully
headline.print_headline: To Carry the Day, Racers Must Fill Packs Carefully

snippet: Cardiovascular fitness and mental discipline are important in the Arrowhead Ultra 135, an ultradistance race in Minnesota, but don’t discount mastery of one’s gear.
